name: Froggy Hops Home
description:
This is my entry for Mini Jam 79: Frogs. This is my first game jam, and in fact my first ever game!

It's a simple platformer with enemies, hazards, collectibles, and checkpoints. Let me know if you get a perfect game - all five rainbows and no deaths!

Tools
Built using Phaser for the engine, Tiled for the map, and Pixaki and Pixelorama for the sprites.

Art
By @redhead.painter

Sound Effects
https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack

Background Music
Voxel Revolution by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7017-voxel-revolution
